Claim: "The rise in Arctic temperatures is tied to a sudden warming of the stratosphere."
Implication: "The warming of the stratosphere occurred several weeks ago."
Referring expressions: Arctic temperatures, stratosphere  The warming, stratosphere
Formula: (exists b (exists a (IsTiedTo(a,b) and IsSudden(a))) & (forall f (forall e (forall d ( IsTiedTo(d,e) ->  IsOccurred(d,f))))) & (forall g (forall h (  IsSudden(g) ->  IsOccurred(g,h))))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsOccurred(a,c) and IsSeveralWeeksAgo(c))))
